title: MD
biography: Sir Martin Jonathan Landray is a British physician, epidemiologist and data scientist who serves as a Professor of Medicine & Epidemiology at the University of Oxford. Landray designs, conducts and analyses large-scale randomised control trials; including practice-changing international trials that have recruited over 100,000 individuals. Landray previously led the health informatics team that enabled the collection and management of data for the UK Biobank on over half a million people.
aiSummary: Martin Landray is a clinical trials specialist with an H-index of 74 at University of Oxford (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, JAMA, The New England journal of medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
